article_title: Court Holds That Tribe Is Subject To ACA Large Employer Mandate

article_metadata.author: Timothy M. Todd

og.description: A federal district court judge recently held that the Affordable Care Act’s ("ACA") large employer mandate to provide minimum essential coverage does, in fact, apply to Indian tribes. The following facts are culled from the court’s opinion. The Northern Arapaho Tribe, a federally-recognized Indian tribe, “operates several economic enterprises on the [...]
